title: How much xp does it take to get to level 30?
body: I've played over 100 games without xp boosters in a new account and currently I'm level 23 how many more will it take for me to get to level 30 because it seems impossible to get xp especially since theres a lot of smurfs in these levels plus for some reason theres diamonds players randomly in a level 20 average draft game.
